name: Monkey
description: Monkeys live in tropical forests, mountains and even in snowy habitats!
funFact: These guys are primates that can swing through the trees!

name: Buffalo
description: Buffalos are large mammals that live in herds.
funFact: These guys can be black, brown, gray, red or white!

name: Fox
description: A fox is a smaller mammal with unique characteristics.
funFact: These guys are part of the dog family! However, they use their thick tails to help them balance just like cats!

name: Flamingo
description: Flamingos are a type of wading bird.
funFact: These guys have relatively small feet compared to their long legs. They also build volcano-shaped mud nests!

name: Lion
description: Lions are large cats. Males are bigger than females and have a thick mane.
funFact: These guys are social creatures. They live in groups called prides that are made up of a few adult males, related females, and cubs.

name: Proboscis Monkey
description: This endangered species is struggling due to the loss of their natural habitat
funFact: A male of this species is blessed with a massive floppy schnozz which drives the females wild with lust!

name: Kakapo
description: This endangered animal is facing extinction due to hunting, new predators and land clearance.
funFact: These guys are the world's only flightless parrot!

name: Lemur
description: Ninety-six percent of the 107 lemur species in Madagascar are facing extinction due to habitat loss and hunting for the pet trade.
funFact: These guys are native only to Madagascar! They're also the oldest living primates in the world with their origins dating back over 70 million years!
